def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_not_alone = any([all_close([x,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_large
            and check_x_dark
            and check_x_not_alone
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
